publ: by Prayer recited by Jetsunma Ahkon Lhamo
name: WakingFromTheSlumberOfIgnorance
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to a Buddhist aspirational prayer recited by Jetsunma Ahkon Lhamo. You can just say "Alexa, Wake up". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
